author: Frekley
post_text: July 29, 2025 at 7:15 PM#1Hi guys,my mission was to create a Makro to set an fade in the programmer,but with an variable insted of an number. My idea was a macro like this:" Fade $fadetime " but when i go this makro it only swith to value in my programmer and there is no fadetime. And Yes the Varible is set.Sry for my bad english, I am from germany, and thank you for helping me!
title: Fade/Delaytime variable
